org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io

Class BucketizedHiveInputSplit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputSplit
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapred.FileSplit
        • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.HiveInputFormat.HiveInputSplit
          • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.BucketizedHiveInputSplit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, org.apache.hadoop.mapred.InputSplit, org.apache.hadoop.mapred.InputSplitWithLocationInfo

    public class BucketizedHiveInputSplit
extends HiveInputFormat.HiveInputSplit
    HiveInputSplit encapsulates an InputSplit with its corresponding inputFormatClass. The reason that it derives from FileSplit is to make sure "map.input.file" in MapTask.
